name: Sit in a Row and Look at the Wall
name_original: Sit in a Row and Look at the Wall
description:
A jokey Walking Simulator with Creepy Robot Content(TM) for Wizard Jam 5.

Controls:

  • WASD to move Mouse To Look (left to interact, right to zoom) 
  • X to stand up from theatre seat
  • +/- to adjust mouse sensitivity during game play

Release History

v1.1
The "big lighting" update:

  • I did a quick lighting pass
  • Added light and reflection probes
  • Some other ambient lighting like exit sign, etc.

v1.0
The Wizard Jam submission deadline version.
